Package estuary.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameViewFunctionality
    Methods used to assist with handling view drawing and dynamic window sizing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameView  
    ImageHandler
    Responsible for holding all of the image files and animation frames.
    View
    Contains the JFrame window that the end user sees Listens for mouse actions to send to the controller
    ViewCounting
    Handles the drawing and coordinate mapping for the Counting Game
    ViewFinal
    Draws the objects of the final screen
    ViewMainMenu
    Draws the objects for the main menu
    ViewMaze
    This is the View that goes hand-in-hand with the ModelMazeGame Model Used polymorphically inside the View class
    Viewport
    Allows for mapping game coordinates to screen coordinates and vice-versa
    ViewShore
    View used to draw shore game
